name: gdprshare
description: share files according to gdpr rules

scripts.dev: browserify -t browserify-css -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react ] ] src/scripts/app.js -o public/scripts/bundle.js; sed -i 's/node_modules\/bootstrap\/dist\///g' public/scripts/bundle.js
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production browserify -t browserify-css -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react ] ] -p [ uglifyify --no-sourcemap ] src/scripts/app.js | terser --compress --mangle > public/scripts/bundle.js; sed -i 's/node_modules\/bootstrap\/dist\///g' public/scripts/bundle.js

author: Viktor Liu
